sql.search: SELECT main.uid ,main.enterprise_uid ,main.execute_record_uid ,main.function_code ,main.function_name ,main.function_type_cd ,main.function_method ,main.execute_start_date ,main.execute_end_date ,main.execute_machine ,main.source_system_name ,main.dest_system_name ,main.execute_content ,main.execute_result_sum ,main.result ,main.result_code ,main.result_message ,main.migration_date ,main.remark ,main.insert_user ,main.update_user ,main.insert_date ,main.update_date ,main.record_status ,SYS011.sub_name function_type_name ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name FROM sys_execute_log_history main LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary SYS011 ON SYS011.record_status = 1 AND SYS011.main_cd = 'SYS011' AND SYS011.sub_cd = main.function_type_cd LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user WHERE main.record_status = 1
